snippet: The mayor promoted his development plan, which would transform blocks of rowhouses and vacant lots in Brooklyn into a community with lower-cost housing.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio visits St Rita's Roman Catholic Church in East New York neighborhood of Brooklyn to promote rezoning and development plan that would bring classrooms, parks, bike lanes and low-cost housing to area; residents, suspicious of gentrification sweeping other areas of Brooklyn, have regarded plan warily.

keywords.value: St Rita's Roman Catholic Church (Brooklyn, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The mayor promoted his development plan, which would transform blocks of rowhouses and vacant lots in Brooklyn into a community with lower-cost housing.

headline.print_headline: Mayor Aims to Sell Wary Churchgoers on Rezoning Plan for East New York
headline.main: De Blasio Aims to Sell Wary Churchgoers on Rezoning Plan for East New York
